usecaseFold.heading: More Outlets.No More Chaos.
usecaseFold.description: Get real-time control over stock, margins, and payments across all your branches—so growth doesn't come at the cost of confusion.
usecaseFold.businessTagline: Over 1000 businesses trust Effortless to streamline their processes and save 400+ hours monthly

serviceContent.title: Where Multi-Location Ops
serviceContent.description: More branches usually mean more Excel, more errors, and more follow-ups — unless your systems scale with you.

topImagecards.title: We lose sales because stock isn't where it's needed.
topImagecards.description: Inventory isn't visible live, stockouts happen at fast-moving outlets, and opportunities are missed.

topImagecards.title: Pricing and discounts are inconsistent across outlets.
topImagecards.description: Without centralized control, margins leak branch by branch—and profits silently shrink.

topImagecards.title: Cash flow is unpredictable across locations.
topImagecards.description: With no real-time view of collections, dues, or expenses outlet-wise, cash gets stuck without you even knowing.

topImagecards.title: Approvals and transfers take days, not minutes.
topImagecards.description: Manual stock transfer, billing, and settlement cause slowdowns that frustrate teams—and customers.

topImagecards.title: Tally and accounts are always one step behind reality.
topImagecards.description: Sales happen daily, but books stay outdated—creating reconciliation nightmares at month-end.

topImagecards.title: Opening more outlets just multiplies the chaos.
topImagecards.description: Every new location adds more manual work, communication gaps, and room for mistakes—making scaling painful instead of profitable.

serviceContent.title: Operate Every Outlet Like It's
serviceContent.description: From sales to stock to compliance, Effortless gives you full control across every branch, warehouse, and retail outlet — without messy coordination or broken systems.

featuresBanner.title: Keep Stock Flowing to the Right Outlet at the Right Time
featuresBanner.description: Never miss a sale because of stockouts, misallocations, or delayed transfers across branches.
features: Live outlet-wise inventory tracking across all locations
Auto-trigger stock transfer requests when thresholds are hit
Fast stock approval and transfer workflows
Tally auto-sync to keep inventory records accurate across branches

featuresBanner.title: Control Pricing and Margins Across Every Outlet
featuresBanner.description: Standardize pricing, discounts, and taxes in real time—protecting your margins while scaling.
features: Centralized price list and discount management across outlets
Auto-apply GST, service charges, and location-specific rates
Real-time updates pushed to outlet billing systems
Instant alerts if unauthorized pricing changes happen

featuresBanner.title: See Cash Flow Across Branches in Real Time
featuresBanner.description: Track collections, payments, dues, and expenses at each outlet—live and without reconciliation delays.
features: Live dashboard of outlet-wise cash position and collections
Bank integration for real-time tracking of deposits and payments
Automated reconciliation between billing and bank entries
Instant alerts for overdue collections or unusual cash patterns

serviceContent.title: What You Unlock
serviceContent.description: When every outlet is connected, synced, and visible — scale becomes manageable.

useCaseSection.title: See What's Happening — at Every Outlet, in Real Time
solution: Open more outlets without multiplying manual work, backend chaos, or staffing overheads.
Standardize ops across branches from Day 1 — stock, billing, approvals, collections.

useCaseSection.title: Real-Time Control Over Inventory, Margins, and Cash
solution: Always know what's selling, what's stuck, and what's due—outlet by outlet.
Protect margins by enforcing price controls and smart discounting.
Manage working capital better with live cash visibility across your network.

useCaseSection.title: Higher Operational Efficiency Without Adding Teams
solution: Automate stock transfers, approvals, reconciliations, and reporting.
Free up your best people to focus on expansion, not paperwork.
Scale your outlets 5x faster with the same lean backend.

useCaseSection.title: Stronger Outlet-Level Growth Decisions
solution: Spot where margins are slipping and fix them before they become costly.
Allocate stock, budgets, and attention based on live, actionable data — not gut feel.

serviceContent.title: Pick the Plan That
serviceContent.description: Choose the plan that works best for your business. All plans include core features with different limits.

packageItems: E-Invoicing and eWay Bill on Mobile and Desktop
Customer-Level access to Sales and Account Management Team
E-Invoicing and eWay Bill (Up to 5000 Invoices)
Customer Group-Level access to Sales and Account Management Team
E-Invoicing and eWay Bill (Up to 10000 Invoices)
Anti-Fraud Measures for Tracking Salesperson Productivity
Unlimited E-Invoicing and eWay Bill on Mobile and Desktop
Reimbursement Module (INR 150 per Month Per User)

serviceContent.title: Built for Startups
serviceContent.description: Here's what customers say about Effortless

testimonials.name: S. Swaminathan
testimonials.review: Managing the entire business through an app is incredibly convenient and efficient. While the initial setup took some time—especially for tasks like setting up business accounts and integrating with GST portals—it was made much easier with the support of a skilled accountant who ensured everything was done smoothly and accurately.

testimonials.name: S.Saravanan Sundaramoothy
testimonials.review: As a startup founder, Effortless has greatly simplified managing our finances. The invoicing and collection features have optimized our cash flow, while the team ensures we stay fully compliant with GST and TDS, letting us focus on scaling the business.

testimonials.name: Hari Shankar
testimonials.review: Effortless is a true, unified solution for business finance. With a strong product and a strong team, Effortless really gives me the experience I was looking for when I was using other tools and services. Effortless helps me worry less about finance and compliance and gives me more time to focus on building the company.

serviceContent.title: Ready to Experience
serviceContent.description: Step into a world of smooth, effortless financial management

callBackCards.title: Talk to Us
callBackCards.description: Have questions about how Effortless can transform your business? Our team of experts is ready to help.
callBackCards.subText: We'll reach out within 4 business hours

callBackCards.title: Request Demo
callBackCards.description: See Effortless in action with a personalized demo tailored to your business.
callBackCards.subText: Choose a time that works for you
list: Get a clear picture of your potential ROI

callBackCards.title: Start Free Trial
callBackCards.description: Experience the full power of Effortless risk-free for 14 days.
callBackCards.subText: Be up and running in minutes

productsSection.title: ProPay
productsSection.subTitle: Smarter Control over Every Expense
productsSection.description: ProPay simplifies expense management with real-time insights, automated payments, and full compliance. Streamline invoicing, boost cash flow visibility, and gain smarter expense control for growth.

productsSection.title: PRISM
productsSection.subTitle: Know More. Manage Better
productsSection.description: Prism empowers you with real-time visibility into financials and inventory, delivering timely reports and strategic insights that drive smarter decisions and optimize capital.

faqsSection.question: How does PULSE address small business challenges like late payments and overdue invoices?
faqsSection.answer: With PULSE, you can track outstanding payments, send automated reminders, and gain real-time insights into receivables, helping you reduce delays and improve cash collection.
